title: [Icemule Trail, Tundra]
description: A sunbeam glints off a rock lying among many others scattered along the shore of the frozen river before you.  Across the river, which flows from the mountains and feeds the marsh, a few stubborn trees bravely line the bank.

A moonbeam glints off a rock lying among many others scattered along the shore of the frozen river before you.  Across the river, which flows from the mountains and feeds the marsh, a few stubborn trees bravely line the bank.
